title: Black Friday Discounts
headline: Black Friday Discounts
subtitle: Available through December 4
content:
Splash some of that criminally earned wealth on a sprawling set of properties, luxury vehicles, and more all discounted for a limited time during this Black Friday week.

Find discounts on properties such as Hangars, Super Class Vehicles, Helicopters, and more at their respective in-game websites.

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for the full list of discounted Black Friday items available through December 4.
